description:
Garg Rice Industries -- one of India's leading rice millers and exporters-- was incorporated in 1984. Over the past two decades, it has provided its consumers with the world's finest Basmati rice. Although Garg Rice began with a modest single product line, Prateek Basmati, the portfolio has expanded to incorporate a multitude rice varieties These are sourced from the most fertile regions of the world to produce the highest quality products. Today the Company markets many brands of Basmati rice which includes the famous Prateek Pure Basmati Rice. `Prateek' brand is an exclusive brand for special grade Basmati rice. PRATEEK Basmati Rice - one of the finest among all the varieties of rice. Top-most in quality, pearl-white, long-grained, protein-enriched rice. The aroma, the texture and the taste, simply the best.



We first ensure that each grain of rice is at least 7.1 mm long and has its tips intact. Then we mill it to a whiteness of 40. And, finally, when all our stringent quality specifications have been met, we age it under controlled conditions for a period of over one year.Garg Rice is unique amongst rice producers. Indeed, today Garg rice is one of the few companies in India that can produce Basmati rice conforming to International standards.The Company boasts of two state-of-the-arts processing plants with an installed capacity of 6MT per hour and consisting of sophisticated equipments imported from the United States, England and Japan. These plants also contain automatic equipment that packages rice in jute bags, pouches, mono cartons and laminated paper bags. An independent research laboratory supplements quality control to further improve upon the product.Now, after having established its name in the Indian Basmati rice market, world-wide we are moving into a number of other food products. All set to repeat its success in the rice industry. Its trading operation became a partnership company - R.D & Sons- which is involved in exports of all kinds of pulses/ lintels from India.
name: Garg Rice Industries

Short Rice:
 Experience the versatility of short rice varieties that cater to diverse culinary preferences. Whether for daily meals or special occasions, our short rice offerings provide the perfect foundation for delectable dishes.

 Indulge in the delightful Swarna rice, known for its aromatic fragrance and fluffy texture. Haji Rice ensures that every grain of Swarna rice embodies the rich heritage and premium quality associated with Basmati rice.

 Elevate your dining experience with the exquisite Sona Masoori rice. Known for its unique flavor profile and tender grains, Sona Masoori from Haji Rice adds a touch of sophistication to every meal.

Onion:

description:
GRM Overseas Ltd (GRM). is the third largest basmati rice exporter to the world and second largest to the Middle East as per latest APEDA data. The Company is primarily focused on traditional varieties of basmati rice and is also currently the global leader in Indian specialty rice. GRM sells basmati rice, premium long-grain rice grown only in certain regions of the India sub-continent, under their flagship brands "Tanoush","Himalaya River" as well as under third party brands.



The Company was founded in 1974 and has a 45 year old legacy of quality and trust in the rice business. GRM operates from three state of the art manufacturing facilities, two in Panipat, Haryana and the other in Gandhidham, Gujarat. Exports are made to over 32 countries, including USA, UK and other European countries and is one of the largest Indian rice exporters to the Gulf region.



GRM is headquartered in India, with regional / subsidiary offices in the US and UK. The Company aims to deliver the best quality products to customers with stringent and proactive quality control procedures in place which is in accordance with international requirements.



Going forward, GRM is focused on diversification of the product portfolio into highquality value-added offerings such as branded basmati, specialty rice varieties and organic rice products for the international markets.
name: GRM Overseas Limited

Manufacture & Export of



# About company -The president of Sandeulnuli, Inc. is known as a pioneer in organic farming industry. Since early 1992, he has been involved with the implementation of organic farming to this day. After graduating from Agricultural Meister College (4 year college), he passed Agricultural Meister Qualification Examination conducted by the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry and became the first Agricultural Meister in Republic of Korea. He has been introducing organic agriculture through a number of lectures at agricultural high schools, colleges of agriculture, national agricultural technology centers nationwide. Sandeulnuli, Inc. has directly been producing and distributing pesticides, fungicides, fertilizers, etc., helping closely bring organic farming into our life. d, Sandeulnuli, Inc. has now become a pioneer in 6th industry as it has been involved with producing (1st industry), processing (2nd industry), and distributing and servicing (3rd industry). Sandeulnuli, Inc. has been exporting its products to the United States since 2015, providing the organic foods to various places through its exclusive distributor in Los Angeles. We are constructing our new manufacturing facility in an attempt to acquire HACCP certification in 2016 and expected to obtain the certification within the year. In our new manufacturing facility, we plan to open a museum where all the materials needed for the production of organic foods and the history of the organic farming are to be displayed. We plan to add two more kinds of dietary supplements in 2016. # Main products: 1. Organic Purslane Powder Brown Rice Enzyme - Sandeulnuli enzymes with nature's vigorous vitality! We use special organic ingredients such as turmeric, samchae, barley sprouts, purslane, chokeberry, rice bran, etc. We directly grow and produce the organic foods in our specialized enzyme (Agriculture Meister) farm. Through repeating the fermentation process twice, the nutrition in the ingredients and beneficial microbes are highly activated. It has even more special effects, which uses "Sanyacho fermented and digestive enzyme" born from specific enzymes beneficial to our digestive system and selected from thousands of different enzymes. 2. Green Peace no.1 1) It contains amino acid, marine active substance, and povic acid and is suitable for garden crops. 2) It improves vitality for early growth and accelerates crop recovery and growth in a short period of time. 3) It promotes beneficial microbial propagation in soil and increases intelligence.
name: Sand deul nu ri  Agricultural Co.,Ltd

Fowler Westrup is an ISO 9001: 2000 certified comapny & has been delivering cutting-edge solutions to the agricultural industry seed, grains, pulses, spices, millet & other food grains for two decades. Established in 2000 as a joint venture between John Fowler (India) Pvt. Ltd. and Westrup A/s, Denmark, we are today the leading providers of post harvesting machinery and industrial equipment in the field of cleaning, grading, storing, milling, sorting, material handling & conveying and filtration solutions for clients worldwide. Fowler Westrup is synonymous with engineering excellence and reliable performance backed by world class R&D and application test center.


Leading Manufacturers, Exporter & Specializes in providing complete integrated solutions to Food Processing Industry with Post Harvest Processing Machinery, Grain Storage Silo Systems, Rice Milling Machinery, Seed Processing machinery, Millet Processing machinery, Opto Electronic Color Sorters, Material Handling Equipment / Grain Handling Equipment and to Power Industry Transformer Oil Filtration & Regeneration Systems.


Manufacturers of World's Best Color Sorter From Fowler Westrup. One Product, Multiple Applications...






World class product which can be remotely monitored & setting adjustment to suit multi commodities by use of cloud digital platform. It helps the Indian food processing companies to ensure final quality to grow the exports.

Post-Harvest Machinery - Cleaning, Grading & Sorting Machines


Opto Electronic Color Sorter


Galvanized Silo Storage Systems 


Rice Milling Machinery & Solutions


Transformer Oil Filtration & Regeneration Systems


Material / Grain Handling & Conveying System - Elevators, Conveyers & Accessories


Spares & Services.


 Fowler Westrup process machinery is ideally suited for the processing, handling & storage of seeds, seed spices, grains, tea, coffee, pulses, basmati & non-basmati paddy & rice. The company also provides turn-key solutions to all processing needs.Design, Manufacture of Complete Galvanized Silo Storage Systems for Grains, Pulses, Oil Seeds, Cereals, Seed Spices etc.

NIRMAL 
Oil Filtration & Regenration System.



Agriculture Process Machines : Post Harvesting Machines-Modular Cleaners, Pre Cleaners, Fine Cleaner, Gravity Separators, Destoner, Indented Cylinders, LAB Machines, Cyclones.

Opto Electronic Color Sorter - Rice Sorter, Dal Sorter, Sooji Sorter.

description:
IMMER, is a professionally managed organization , an Amsterdam headquartered full-fledged agri-commodity export & import trading company with branch and subsidiary offices in Switzerland, Singapore and India. IMMER trades in varied range of agri commodities : cotton, coffee, sugar, rice, grains & cocoa.IMMER has very strong capabilities of sourcing cotton and sugar from India, coffee from Vietnam and cocoa from West Africa.We source Agri products like Cotton, Sugar, Coffee, Cocoa, and Grains from producing countries at most competitive prices and supply to the world market with the best customer services. This helps large consumers and trading houses source goods directly from farms and primary processors in a very efficient way with limited risk.We are directly and indirectly in touch with various mills, refineries, large producers to source, store & transport products to our customers.The company operates from its offices in the Netherlands, Switzerland, Singapore, and India.







The company thrives to provide high-quality products with excellent customer service.



The raw material is originated & sourced from the farms and mills, which are then stored & transported to customers across the globe.IMMER is committed to the farmer community in increasing the crop yield, building a global market-place for their output and improving their income.We aim to contribute towards the growing food demand globally. The Agri products are supplied across the world through a globally integrated supply chain.The products are originated from surplus producing regions and supplied to regions with high demand.Our team works closely with farmers and other stakeholders to improve sustainability across the supply chain.







IMMER believes in providing end-to-end services in Global Trade and Bespoke Sustainable Supply Chain Solutions to its suppliers and buyers.The fundamental principles of the company are, Integrity, Passion, Entrepreneurship, Commitment and Teamwork.







The company’s ambition to perform to its best is driven by its deep-passion to excel in the field of international agri-trading and structured Supply Chain Solutions.
name: Immer Commodities India Private Limited

description:
Indian Broiler Group (IB Group), Over 37 Years of experience in producing world-class Protein from Chicken and Soya.


Indian Broiler Group (IB Group), India's largest Agri-biz conglomerate under the brand name ABIS, is present in Poultry, Livestock Feed, Edible Oil, Pet Food, Solvent, FMCG, Processed Protein Products and Hospitality segments.


IB Group - India's largest protein-centric Agri-biz conglomerate with a turnover of INR 9700 Crore in FY 2023 headquartered in Chhattisgarh's Rajnandgaon district. The company has been synonymous with excellence and poultry since 1985 and is the first Poultry Company to be certified as a Great Place to Work. 


Our founder and Managing Director - Mr Bahadur Ali, is a dynamic visionary popularly known as the ‘Father of Modern Poultry in India.’ 


The diversified agribusiness conglomerate has a robust presence in 26 states. Through its strategic partnerships with 25,000+ farmers, dealer network, and a dedicated team of 12,000+ employees, we have earned our place as "India's integrated protein leader". 


The group has been driving innovation and transforming poultry farming with sustainable practices and cutting-edge technology. 


While, ABIS brand of IB group has a significant presence in India across B2B and B2C categories in livestock feed, edible oil, and processed chicken.


Our Brands & Products : IB Group Presents a Diverse Product Portfolio Comprising Best-in-Class Offerings Available to Customers Under The Brand “ABIS”


Specialties : Poultry, Poultry Rearing, Poultry integration, Soya bean oil, Soya bean meal, Dairy, Animal Feed includes Poultry, Shrimp & Fish feed, Specialised Pet Food, Rice Bran Oil, Hatchery, Table top Eggs, Pet Food, and EC Poultry House.

Agronic Food Pvt. Ltd is a Globally Acclaimed & Trusted Certified Organic Food Company, 


At Agronic Food Pvt. Ltd we provide pure, great-tasting organic grains, spices, herbs, cereals, oils and much more that consumers rely on as the cornerstone of their nutritional health. We strongly believe organic food is an essential choice for personal and environmental health. We offer the broadest selection of certified organic products that are Non GMO, Gluten Free and Kosher. Our products only come from organic growers and harvesters and every single partner we work with is Certified Organic harvester helping us maintain world’s precious eco-systems and biodiversity.


Agronic food's range comprises over 250 + products. The team at Agronic Food works closely with 40,000 farmers enabling and encouraging them towards sustainable organic farming. Every activity thereafter with regard to producing, processing and exporting is done with strict adherence to stringent quality norms and practices. We built a strong foundation which is quality driven. This mindset is conveyed through a system of meticulous planning and execution. It is an inbuilt thought process which flows seamlessly from the head of the company to the farmer working at ground level.


Specialties : Certified Organic, Non GMO, Worldwide Presence, A Decade Of Experience, Widest Range, Farm Level Sourcing, In-house Processing Unit, Quality Assurance, Sustainable Approach.

description:
27 YEARS OF INDUSTRIES EXPERIENCE, WE EXPORT OVER 200 MADE-IN-INDIA PRODUCTS AND GOODS TO THE AFRICAN MARKETS.


Koshambh Multitred Pvt. Ltd. was founded in 1995 in India. Headquartered in India, the Group has operations in India, UAE, Western Africa, Indonesia, and Hong Kong with products and services exported to over 23 countries. With 27 years of entrepreneurial experience across generations, the business has evolved from retail to trading, to manufacturing and brand building. While we are present in a number of industries, our primary focus is Fast-Moving Consumer Goods, Textiles, Automotive, Pharmaceutical and Engineering Services. 


PRODUCTS WE EXPORT :




Agrochemical
 : Fertiliser, Fungicides, Herbicides, Insecticides.


Automobile
 : Agriculture Implements, TAFE Tractors, Automobile Oil & Lubricants, Special Products, Tyres & Tubes, Helmets, Motorcycles, Spare Parts. Koshambh exports a wide range of products from the Automobile industry. We export a full range of spare parts of two-wheelers of India’s most trusted brands like TVS, BAJAJ, Yamaha, Hero. We export the best quality of lubricants and oil from Shell and TVS, Tyres from MRF, CEAT, TVS. We export different accessories for 4-wheelers and trucks like brake pads, batteries, oil filters and more. We also supply different agricultural implements and helmets. We make sure you can export automobiles and spare parts in Africa most easily and transparently.


FMCG
 : We export your sundry product at light speed. These products include stationery products like pens, pencils, notebooks, kitchen items like matches, matchbox, stoves. We export every item you can think of because we’re the export expert!


Food Product
 : Rice, Tea, Coffee, Biscuits, Salt, Candy, Confectionery and more. Our hassle-free export services will help you to export various food products in African markets effortlessly in the smallest to largest quantities.


OBD Carry Bags
 ; Koshambh manufactures and exports high-quality, fancy and eco-friendly plastic bags in large quantities. We offer different kinds of plastic carry bags and bags for packaging different agricultural foods and products in various colours, sizes, shapes, materials and prints as per your requirements.


Pharmaceuticals
 : We export different pharmaceutical items like Inject-able medicines, Local anesthetics, Anti-infective medicines and more.


Textile
 : Cotton, Polyester, Suitings, Shirtings, Embroidery, Voile.


Koshambh is also a leading small scale manufacturing business. We majorly manufacture various kinds of premium biscuits and high quality of plastic.We also export our manufactured products to ensure our customers have supplies to sell in African markets.Koshambh is also a leading small scale manufacturing business. We majorly manufacture various kinds of premium biscuits and high quality of plastic.We also export our manufactured products to ensure our customers have supplies to sell in African markets.We have an exceptional team of experts who handles our logistic department. Right from Packing, to Transport, to Authorization, to Shipping the products and goods, our team ensures the seamless hassle-free process. We strive to deliver the shipment to every customer in the shortest timelines.Koshambh is a company with a rich heritage and a tradition of excellence that we are proud to continue today. Boasting an experience of over 27 years we are one of the leading exporters from India. Our services often assist our clients to translate their exporting and entrepreneurial endeavors into a reality.Often termed as the ‘Export Experts’ we house extensive knowledge entailing the know-hows of shipping a wide range of products to the African countries such as Democratic Republic of Congo, Niger, and Angola (To name a few). We pride ourselves to have an amazing specialty sourcing team. Besides export shipping we also assist our clients in areas dealing with the logistical technicalities such as legal procedures, mandatory information, categorization of products and items you desire to export.





As the ‘Expert Exporters’ we stand by our conviction to provide you the best possible platform for penetrating and making a mark in the international markets.


Our culture is shaped by our guiding values: Trust, Respect, Commitment, Courage, and Humility.
name: Koshambh Multitred Private Limited

description:
Tristar Basmati Rice
, headquartered in the bustling metropolis of New Delhi, India, stands as a premier exporter and supplier of premium basmati rice, celebrated for its exceptional quality and aromatic richness. With a commitment to delivering the finest grains to global markets, Tristar Basmati Rice has become synonymous with culinary excellence.

Product Range:




Classic Basmati Rice:
 Tristar's Classic Basmati Rice is the epitome of purity and aroma. Sourced from the fertile regions of India, each grain carries the authentic essence of traditional basmati, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of culinary creations.


Premium Extra Long Grain Basmati Rice:
 Setting a benchmark for excellence, Tristar's Premium Extra Long Grain Basmati Rice boasts an elongated grain that enhances the visual appeal and texture of every dish. This premium variety is carefully curated to meet the discerning taste of connoisseurs worldwide.


Golden Sella Basmati Rice:
 Characterized by its unique processing method, Tristar's Golden Sella Basmati Rice undergoes parboiling, giving it a golden hue and robust flavor. This variety is known for its ability to absorb flavors, making it an ideal choice for biryanis and other aromatic rice dishes.


Brown Basmati Rice:
 Catering to health-conscious consumers, Tristar offers Brown Basmati Rice, which retains the outer bran layer, providing additional nutritional benefits. It's a wholesome option for those seeking a healthier alternative without compromising on the distinct basmati taste.


Steamed Basmati Rice:
 Tristar's Steamed Basmati Rice undergoes a meticulous steaming process, ensuring that each grain retains its natural nutrients and flavors. The result is a fluffy and aromatic rice variety that serves as a perfect accompaniment to a variety of dishes.


To know more, please visit 

https://www.tristarbasmatirice.com/

, situated in the dynamic city of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, stands as a prominent manufacturer and supplier of premium food and agricultural products. With a steadfast commitment to sustainability, innovation, and excellence, Al Dahra Agricultural Company caters to the diverse needs of consumers, retailers, and wholesalers across the globe.

Their extensive product range encompasses:




Grains & Specialty Crops

Rice
: Renowned for its superior taste and texture, Al Dahra Agricultural Company's rice products are a testament to their dedication to quality. With a variety of rice strains available, including basmati and jasmine, customers can savor the authentic flavors of this staple grain.


Flour

From all-purpose flour to specialty blends, their products deliver consistent results in baking and cooking applications.


Dairy
: Embracing the richness of dairy products, Al Dahra Agricultural Company offers a wide selection of premium dairy items. From milk and cheese to yogurt and butter, their dairy products are produced with utmost care to preserve freshness and flavor.


Fresh Produce
: With a focus on freshness and flavor, Al Dahra Agricultural Company's fresh produce range comprises an assortment of fruits and vegetables sourced from the finest farms. From crisp apples and juicy oranges to vibrant bell peppers and leafy greens, their produce delights the senses and nourishes the body.


Organic

Hindustan Foods Limited is proud to be ‘The Brawn Behind Your Brands’ 


Hindustan Foods Limited, India's most diversified FMCG Contract Manufacturer, offering manufacturing, packing and distribution services to all the leading International & domestic FMCG companies in India. 


All the production facilities & factories are well equipped and have latest quality certifications such as BRC Global standards, BIS (Bureau of Indian Standards), ISO 9001:2008, ISO 9001, ISO 22000: 2005, GMP & Halal Certifications. The group has a large manufacturing footprint across the country and offers its customers various solutions that can be optimized for run size (low volume to mass production), seasonality, location and taxation. It has demonstrated its ability to execute and run large projects across product categories, across geographies. The Vanity Case Group has a strong focus on Corporate Social Responsibility and undertakes various activities primarily focused on the Girl Child - her hygiene, education, safety and overall well-being.


Hindustan Foods Limited, is a leading Manufacturer & Supplier Of Cereal Based Food Products Including Baby Foods, Instant Porridges, Breakfast Cereals & Health Drinks, Weaning Foods, Porridges & High Protein Products, Leather Footwear, Mosquito Coils & Repellents.

Services :


CONTRACT MANUFACTURING


Hindustan Foods Limited is the most diversified and versatile contract manufacturing company in the country.The product range covers Personal Care, Home Care, Food & Beverages and Leather. Decades of expertise which is the result of highly experienced teams in various locations, supported by a judicious mix of machines and systems provides confidence and cost effectiveness to the customer.


The facilities are fully integrated, equipped with modern laboratories as well as processing, packaging, warehousing and logistic facilities. The group is known for its commitment to the quality systems and the focus on continuous improvement.


The group is very flexible in its approach and is equipped to handle a wide range of formulations, batch sizes and packaging formats. Hindustan Foods Limited is able to cater to even seasonal requirements and unexpected demand overflows from Marketeers. New products with an immediate or short term window have been comfortably handled and nurtured by the Hindustan Foods Limited team, the reason why many of the temporary associations got transformed to long term partnerships.

description:
Anmol Industries Limited is a Leading & Most Competative Biscut Manufacturing, Confectionery Producers, FMCG, Packaged Food Company in INDIA. 


Leading Manufacturers and Exporters Of Biscuits, Cakes, Cookies, Rusks, Recipes and Mukkund.






Having 61 Variety Of Biscuits, 26 Variety Of Cakes, 4th Largest Biscuit Brand In INDIA, 5th Largest Cake Brand In INDIA.


Anmol Industries Ltd. (formerly Anmol Biscuits Ltd.) is an established brand and a prominent player in Biscuits and Bakery market in India. 


Product range covers an assortment of biscuits in sweet, semi-sweet, health segment, premium cookies and a variety of bar, cup and tiffin cakes and rusk produced at world class state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities. Guided by strong principles of Quality, Ethics and Brand Promise, Anmol has evolved as one of the most trusted and responsible brands in the packaged food industry.






Products :


Biscuits - 
Jeera Biscuits, Cream Biscuits, Coconutty Biscuits, Marie Plus Crunchy Biscuits, Thin Arrowroot Biscuits, Mango Mazaa Biscuits, Choco Mazaa Biscuits, Chocolate, Orange, Milk, Elaichi, Lemon and Fruit Biscuits.





Crackers -
 Veg Munch Crackers, Sugar Free Cream Cracker.





Cookies - 
Cashew Cookies, Butter Bake Cookies, Chocolate Chip Cookies, Butter Bake Kaju Cookies,





Cakes -
 Bar Cakes - Chocolate Caes, Orange Cakes, Milk and Vanilla Cakes, Fruit Cake and Pineapple Cakes.





Tiffin Cakes -
 Butterscotch, Fruit, Pineapple, Chocolate, Orange, Milk and Vanilla Tiffn Cakes, Sandwich Cakes, Jamfills Cake, Kream Cake.





Cookies -
 Romanzo Cookies.Anmol Industries Limited is a leading player in the FMCG of India, spread across the Northern, Eastern and Southern parts of the country. Anmol Industries Limited came into being as a result of the merger of two strong business units, Anmol Bakers Ltd., which operated in North India and Anmol Biscuits Ltd., which marketed the brand in Eastern India, cementing its position as one of the leading packaged food brands in India. Anmol today is an established brand in the biscuit and confectionery market with a turnover of more than Rs. 1200 crore, making it among India’s top four biscuit brands. With a network of more than 2500 distributors, Anmol’s products are available in more than 15 lakh outlets across north and east India.Breaking geographical barriers, Anmol exports a wide and exclusive range of biscuits to Asia, Africa, Europe, Middle East and Caribbean Islands.Our export products have been specially developed to cater to the particular taste of each nation. The supreme packaging along with the logistics support, ensures optimum freshness and longer shelf life. The nutritional goodness too, stays intact under diverse climatic conditions. Take a bite and let your taste buds relish the yummy ‘Fresh Flavour’ and ‘Taste’.

Quality: The Company is ISO 22000:2005 certified & all its facilities comply with stringent GMP, GHP HACCP & HALAL norms.

Pioneered the manufacture of naturally sourced and preservative-free ready to eat meals. 


Regal Kitchen Foods, have been a trailblazer in pioneering high quality and premium ready-to-eat foods.


Supplier of vegetarian ready-to-eat and ready-to-cook vegetarian food products globally. 


Our Portfolio ranges from prepared meals for the retail segment to HoReCa packs of Ready-To-Eat Indian Curries, Indian Sweets, Chutneys and Ready-To-Cook Base Gravies, Marinades and Cooking Paste. Through these, we cover all segments ranging from instant pasta for your family, daily kitchen needs to bulk orders in the HoReCa industry.

 In 1985, he became fascinated with handmade coffee during his stay in Tokyo. He could not do anything that has to do with coffee even while staying in Tokyo for more than 10 years. description:
Services - Wholesale - green coffee beans. Suppliers of arabica coffee.We have considerable experience importing green coffee beans into New Zealand.



We understand the challenges faced by the growing number of roasters across the country and have tailored both our range and our service to provide them with the value they need - good coffee, consistently and safely delivered, at a realistic price.



The best coffee comes from Under-Developed countries, where life is very different; infrastructure is basic, there is often political instability, weather systems are more extreme, the business code of ethics is too often inextricably linked to basic survival, and there are myriad cultural idiosyncrasies at play. Obtaining agricultural crops from these counties comes with a unique set of challenges, which, over many years of business, we have acquired the knowledge to navigate our way through.Other Grocery Wholesaling

#Company Introduction



A coffee taste is decided by new crop selection with their environment. There are some important factors such as product areas geographical features, soil, temperature, harvest time to decide the coffee flavor. In the rapidly changing coffee market, Aldo Coffee roasters, pursue to secure the supply of only the best quality of the new crop rather than quantity. Also, we will achieve qualitative growth by devoting the technical development to each part of cupping, roasting, extract. Aldo coffee will offer perfect trust with these ideas to the customers.



Aldo Coffee company thanks you.







# Strength



The essence of good coffee that Aldo coffee pursues starts with selecting green beans grown under the best growth condition.



The geography of the production area, height of cultivation, soil, rainfall, climate, etc. are important factors in determining the coffees taste. In addition, the environment of the producer, fair trade, transportation process, storage, processing, packaging, that is, all the processes from production to the consumer must be special to be the essence of specialty.



Aldo coffee seeks high-quality green beans and creates new values and culture through the coffee markets qualitative growth with passion and dedication to technological advances in cupping, roasting, and extraction

description:
Manufacture & Export of



# Keyword Airrane, Gas Separation, Air Separation, Membrane, Hollow Fiber, Membrane Module, Oil & gas, Eco-Friendly Energy, Biogas, Biogas Upgrading, Landfill gas, Landfill gas Upgrading, Bio-methane, N2 Generation, O2 Generation, CO2 Injector, OBIGGS, GTL, Gas-to-Liquid, DME, Dimethyl ether, O2 Enrichment, Carbon Capture, CCS, CCU, Dehumidification, Membrane Dryer, SF6 Capture, Waste Water Recycling, Nitrogen Coffee, Nitrogen Bier # Company Introduction Airrane were founded in the NRL (National Research Laboratory) for membrane research in Hanyang University in 2001, and have been growing as a specialized company in gas separation membrane. Airrane researches on gas separation which has not been fully established anywhere in the world, and develops independent technologies to lead the global market. Through hollow fiber membrane for gas separation and its application technologies, Airrane provides innovative products and services to satisfy customer's needs according to changes in our lives and economic environment. In addition, to go beyond what we have accomplished yet, we will do our best for development of membrane which can be applied to various fields, e.g. OBIGGS (On Board Inert Gas Generating System), Biogas, GTL (Gas-to-Liquid), DME (Dimethyl ether) technology, CCS (Carbon Capture & Storage) technology, etc. # Product Description & Technical Detail A. Membrane For Biogas Upgrading - Description A number of gas elements are generated from food waste and livestock excretions, but as most of them are methane and carbon dioxide, they can be supplied to long distance after separation process, and the gas can be used for power generation, furnace, business fuel, vehicles, city gas, etc. Membrane separation process, one of the processes for separation of bio-methane, uses separation membrane to selectively flow specific substances through and separate gas, which uses polymer membrane is commonly used for removal of carbon dioxide in biogas. Airrane Co., Ltd. is developing membrane module and process using hollow fiber which can purify bio-methane to high purity. - Technical Detail Bio-methane can be used for energy production, vehicle fuel, insertion to natural gas pipelines, other industrial purposes, and it is receiving more and more attention as an eco-friendly energy source because the substance is same as natural gas from fossil. Airrane Co., Ltd. researches on purification technology to remove moisture, hydrogen sulfide, and siloxane from biogas, mixture of methane and carbon dioxide, and separate methane from carbon dioxide to extract methane with about 98% concentration. B. Gas Separation Membrane For N2 Generation - Description Airrane Co., Ltd.'s membrane module for nitrogen generation is installed in nitrogen generator so that it helps to generate dry nitrogen from compressed air. - Technical Detail These nitrogen generators consist of regulator, pressure gauge, needle valve, so they do not need unnecessary devices and they are inexpensive. C. Gas Separation Membrane For O2 Generation - Description Airrane Co., Ltd.'s oxygen generating modules are designed to have oxygen purity of 30%. They have merits on the efficiency and the price, so it is possible to apply to various processes and systems. - Technical Detail Oxygen generators generate oxygen with compressed air using head compressor or vacuum pump. D. Membrane Dryer - Description Dehumidification of compressed air is done by principle of selective penetration of membrane. Water vapor passes through hollow fiber membrane of several bundles which removes water vapor when the air with water vapor flows out from inside the hollow fiber, and dry air can be collected outside. Part of dry air outside of the hollow fiber membrane is injected inside to prevent condensation of vapor and decline of efficiency. # Catalogue https://prokcssmedia.blob.core.windows.net/sys-master-images/h2c/h9e/9314565685278/catalogue_airrane.pdf # Video https://youtu.be/72drxsPqQg4 # End-user â Nitrogen / Oxygen Generating System : Food & Beverage, Manufacture Industry, Power Plant, Furnace â Membrane Dryer : equipments & machinery â CO2 Injection : Antistatic In Semiconductor & LCD Panel Fabrication â CO2 Removal : Natural Gas, Flue Gas, Syn-gas â Biogas Upgrading : CO2 Removal From Anaerobic Digester & Landfill Gas â OBIGGS : Aircraft & LNG Vessel â Carbon Capture & Storage : Cement Plant, Power Plant
name: Airrane Co., Ltd.

description:
The origins of Fazer Group lie in a family company founded in 1891 



when Karl Fazer opened his first café in Helsinki. 



Today Fazer offers meals and bakery and confectionery products, 



and operates in eight countries.



Fazer is the leading contract catering company in the Nordic and the Baltic 



countries, offering customers delicious food and tailor-made service solutions. 



Fazer has almost 1,400 restaurants in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, 



Estonia, Latvia and Russia. 



.



Services include private and public sector personnel restaurants, student 



restaurants, café-restaurants, restaurants at conference and meeting venues 



as well as food services for schools and public service organisations. Fazer 



offers also catering services for special occasions for its customers. Fazer



Food Services' brands are Karl Fazer, Fazer, Amica and Wip, among others.



Fazer is the leading bakery company in Finland and one of the leading 



ones in the Baltic region. Bread and pastries are manufactured in Finland, 



Sweden, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania and Russia, where Fazer operates under 



the name Hlebnyi Dom. Fazer has a total of 21 bakeries. 



The brands, in addition to Fazer, are Oululainen, Skogaholm, Hlebnyi Dom, 



Druva and Gardesis. Bakery products are exported to over 15 countries. 



.



Fazer Mill & Mixes in Lahti, Finland, is not only a supplier of raw materials 



to bakeries but also a raw material management, research and development 



centre. Most of the production of Fazer Mill & Mixes is sold to customers 



outside Fazer Group.



.



Fazer is Finland's leading confectionery company and a strong player in 



the Baltic Sea region. Fazer's three confectionery factories are located 



in Finland: in Vantaa (chocolate), Lappeenranta (sugar confectionery) 



and Karkkila (chewing gum). Fazer has many strong confectionery brands, 



for instance Karl Fazer, Geisha, Dumle, Tutti Frutti, Marianne, Tyrkisk Peber, 



Pantteri and Xylimax. Confectionery products are exported to ca 27 countries.



xylitol, sugar free, bread, coffee house, chocolate, pastry, cake, 



chewing gum, bubblegum, sweets, buns,short bread, cookies,



toast, restaurant
name: Oy Karl Fazer Ab

Located in Central of China Mainland, Jingmen Cit, Hubei Guanghe Bio-technology Co., Ltd(referred to as the “Hubei Guanghe”) has been engaged in the R&D of polylactic acid(PLA) and its modified material in conjunction with a number of universities and an institute since 2006. Hubei Guanghe makes"human and nature harmony together, life and nature breath together"responsibility, rely on the achievement in scientific research of Donghua University and Sichuan University, Guanghe PLA ( referred to as "GH PLA") reached advanced level. The company set up the joint R & D center, to provide customers with a full range of technical support.



GH PLA has get the EN13432 biodegradable certification OK COMPOST issued by Vincotte, demonstrating that our products are 100% biodegradable and compostable and passed the test made by SGS stated in Commission Regulation (EU) No.10/2011 and Regulation (EC) No. 1935/2004 of the European Parliament and the Council on plastic materials and articles intended to come into contact with food.



We have successfully developed and put PLA materials into operation as per the follow four different grades: GH401 injection grade for stationery, toys, etc., GH501 sheet grade for tableware, buffer boxes, etc., GH601 bottle grade for Water bottle,Milk bottle,Cosmetics bottle,etc. GH701 film grade for shopping bags, garbage bags, agricultural mulching film, etc.



In addition, Hubei Guanghe cooperate with the outstanding enterprises in the application product fields, develop series of biodegradable products, such as disposable tableware, cosmetics packaging, food packaging, electronics packaging, golf accessories such etc. From products design to moulds development, from raw materials modification to the quality test, from the processing to the packaging of products, we check every link for our customers, to ensure that our PLA products have the absolute competitiveness and advantages in the market.

Martec Distribution, a wholly NZ owned company, was established in 1992 by joint partners, Martin Healey and Trevor Rowse.



Martin came from a background of 14 years with a national soft furnishings wholesaler, the last 4 years as general manager. description:
Continental Coffee Private Limited
 is a prominent manufacturer and exporter of instant coffee, roast & ground coffee, and premix coffee based in Hyderabad, Telangana, India. With over 25 years of experience in the coffee industry, Continental Coffee has established itself as a trusted partner for businesses and consumers seeking premium coffee solutions.Their extensive product portfolio encompasses a wide range of coffee products catering to diverse tastes and preferences, including:

Instant Coffee:
 Continental Coffee offers a variety of instant coffee products, including spray-dried agglomerated coffee, spray-dried coffee, freeze-dried coffee, and instant coffee premixes. Their instant coffee products are known for their rich flavor, aroma, and ease of preparation.

Roast & Ground Coffee:
 The company provides a range of roast & ground coffee products, including freshly roasted and ground Arabica and Robusta beans. Their roast & ground coffee products offer a variety of flavor profiles, from light and aromatic to dark and intense.

Premix Coffee:
 Continental Coffee offers a range of premix coffee products, including cappuccino, mocha, latte, and black coffee premixes. Their premix coffee products provide a convenient and consistent way to enjoy café-style coffee at home or on the go.In addition to their core product offerings, Continental Coffee also provides customized coffee solutions for businesses, including private labeling, contract manufacturing, and product development. Their expertise in coffee processing, blending, and packaging enables them to meet the specific needs of their clients.Continental Coffee is committed to sourcing high-quality coffee beans from around the world and maintaining stringent quality control measures throughout their manufacturing process. description:
Hangzhou Qingxin Tea Co.,Ltd is a leading organic tea supplier in China and also have subsidiary company in Europe. Besides organic teas, we supply other organic products as well. Our organic products are as follows:



1. Organic tea products such as green tea, white tea, oolong tea, yellow tea, black tea ,puerh tea,flavored teas,health care teas, teabags, green/black tea powder, instant tea powder, tea extract powder, camellia oil, tea seed oil and tea accessaries,etc;



2. Organic herbal products such as Goji berry(GojiSupplier.com), goji juice,goji oil, hibiscus/roselle flower, rose hip shell cut/whole rose hip with seeds, ganoderma lucidum/reishi mushroom, ginseng, eucommia ulmoides, mulberry leaf, houttuynia, guava leaf,chrysanthemum, honeysuckle flower, cordyceps, radix astragali, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, cedronella, globeflower, barley, saffron, momordica grosvenori, gyrophora, dogbane, sterchilia scaphigera, echinacea, raspberry, etc;



3. Organic coffee beans, nuts, seeds, spices, etc;



4. Organic fruits, vegetables and cooking oils, etc.



With rich experience in dealing with all types of trade, including both large and small orders, we are able to ship our goods safely and reliably to almost everywhere around the world.



Our mission is to supply organic products, competitive prices and best services to quality-conscious buyers.In today's fiercely competitive marketplace,competing on low-price alone isn't enough.So we are very serious about products' quality,moreover, we pursue long-term cooperation with our customers.



Our Advantages:



1. Professional comments: We tell the truth, give professional comments, offer best solutions to help our customers increase their sales.



2. Wide varieties: To save time and offer more organic product varieties for our customers, we have set up four factories located respectively in four regions of China.



3. Reliable organic products with reasonable prices: To get a balance between quality and price, we have done a lot of research work. Now we can supply organic products with very cheap prices.



4. Efficient services: To communicate efficiently and solve problem timely, we recommend our customers use instant messengers such as MSN,Gmail and Yahoo,etc. We always try best to solve problems in a few minuates. Our efficient services also include: reply email quickly, convenient payment solutions and timely shipping.
